attributes.action: HOLD A NATIONAL REFFERENDUM TO BRING BACK THE DEATH PENALTY!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Enough is Enough,  people are fed up with the criminal justice system not working.  For murderers, sex attackers, and the gang culture(cowards), who target innocent, hard working, law abiding British citizens, who are looking out for their family or property.  The death penalty has to be re-instated.  I ask the Prime Minister to hold a national refferendum for the death penalty to be given back to the people of Great Britain.

rejection.details: Please use a full name and please do not write in capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
